#define EnableReferencing (   ) 
 

Value:

public: \
    void addSpReference () \
    { \
        m_uiSpReferences++; \
    } \
    \
    void removeSpReference () \
    { \
        if ( --m_uiSpReferences == 0 ) \
            delete this; \
    } \
    \
    unsigned int getSpReferenceCount () const \
    { \
        return m_uiSpReferences; \
    } \
    \
private: \
    unsigned int m_uiSpReferences
